website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Skechers Equalizer Double Play is a great slip-on pair for people who are always on the go. It has an easy slip-on design in a very breathable upper made of Skech Knit Mesh fabric. The Gel Infused Memory Foam and SoftFlex midsole keeps the foot well-cushioned and comfortable all day. It has a clean sporty moc design that easily matches everyday outfits.
pros: A number of customers love the Skechers Equalizer Double Play for its slip-on construction that slides in and out easily and still feel snug on foot
Numerous reviewers love the Gel Infused Memory Foam saying it feels like walking on clouds in them
Quite a lot of reviewers who have foot complications recommend the pair for its lasting comfort that doesn’t give foot pains at the end of the day
Some users bought multiple pairs of the Skechers Equalizer Double Play saying it’s one of the most comfortable Skechers sneakers they’ve worn
Many customers claim that the sneakers fit great right out of the box and does not require a breaking in period
A lot of reviewers say that the sneakers are very lightweight
Most users attest to the extreme breathability of the pair that keeps the foot cool and dry even for long hours of wearing
cons: A few users say that the sole wears out quickly
A couple of users note that the sneakers lack arch support

customer_reviews.title: Massive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of slip on shoes for when nipping out to do the shopping and bits like that. Don't get me wrong - super comfy when you first get them although a little on the big side. Unfortunately they've completely fallen apart after a few months. These were my first pair of sketchers, and I was prepared to make the switch to the Sketchers brand permanently for the first few weeks... now I'm unlikely to buy the brand again
customer_reviews.author: Scott Manning

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these 10 stars if possible. They are like walking on freaking air!!!! I work on my feet all day and have severe Planis Fascitis I have always bought Clarks Shoes which I thought were well cushioned but these are epic and almost instantly reduce my symptoms. Only downside is they just aren't smart enough to wear with a suit. If Sketchers can make a smart, slightly more formal looking shoe that would be the icing on the cake. Would buy these for life
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAINERS SO GOOD I NOW HAVE 3 PAIRS
customer_reviews.text: Quick Delivery, Perfect Fit, Just The Job, these are much better than the go walks I found go-walks after a while the round buttons on the soles start to squeak when walking, but these Equalizer double play gel infused shoes are excellent and slightly more comfortable there so good I bought another 2 pairs ( Black, Blue, and Charcoal). See Pic
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, not substantial feel
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a very sturdy shoe like my previous 2 skechers which were not sturdy, comfortable shoes but one of them really bobbled really leaving them covered in a fine white covering over the breathable synthetic outer which was black but looked ridiculous in the baubled white. These lack the support and sturdiness for what I am after and just seem too tight and don't seem the same quality although if in a size bigger it may be different but I doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R H Angus

customer_reviews.title: really comfy and lasted me a long time
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these shoes, have had them for 10 months and were still going good and had only little wear despite wearing them everyday for almost everything. Unfortunately my dog decides to wreck one if them last night but I won't hesitate to buy another pair come pay day 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jess358

customer_reviews.title: Poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to getting these as I needed a slip on option for walking. They arrived early, tick, but were much too big. Although they were size 10 which I always get.. Rather than send them back I foolishly tried to make them work by wearing thick socks and packing them out with inserts etc. All to no avail. So I'm stuck with them 😡. It's a shame as they are really comfortable. Just be aware of the sizing issue. I'm just going to stick with my Allbirds which are fabulous although a lot more expensive..
customer_reviews.author: tim jones

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can spend hours writing this review about how great these shoes are. I heard alot about how great and comfortable sketchers shoes are and I decided to give them a shot. Well, now I know why they are very famous and popular. It feels like you are not even wearing shoes and that's how comfortable they are. The look might not be the best, but who cares! Having said that, they look good with outdoor outfits.
customer_reviews.author: M0rph3u5

customer_reviews.title: Supremely comfortable to wear and a generous width
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a friend’s recommendation. They are among the most comfortable shoes I’ve owned. I find I finish the work day with more energy than I used to. I hadn’t realised how much of a drain poor footwear could have. These are slightly wider than a regular size 10, which is what I need. I’ve since bought another pair in another colour. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for those with diabetes.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my dad. Comfortable to wear, easy to slip on, great value for money and lightweight, which is perfect for those with diabetes. Purchased two pairs, different sizes initially, as I was unsure of the size and returned the unwanted size.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sharon Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Highly delighted with my purchase fit is perfect feel very comfortable and will purchase again. Delivery was woeful delivered at 6 -51pm, stating on the tracking handed to customer this is untrue. The parcel was left by the back gate which is always locked for security reasons, The front porch light was on so no excuse for not coming to the front door. Getting rather fed up with late pm deliveries lately.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Orton

customer_reviews.title: As with all Skechers footwear these are amazingly comfortable and incredibly light
customer_reviews.text: As with all Skechers footwear these are amazingly comfortable and incredibly light. On first wear they feel like old friends. Bung them in the washing machine once a month and they come up as new. Despite their lightweight construction, they are tough and outlast most other shoes. The most comfortable shoes I own by far.
customer_reviews.author: JoBo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footwear for indoor comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Sketchers I've bought. These are great for round the house and garden instead of the traditional slippers, and having to change footwear every time I went outside. Excellent comfort, can be used when your on your feet all day. Can be used on the street as casual wear but I find I am rather heavy on my foot fall therefore wear them out quicker than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: moonwillow

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has osteo-arthritis in his ankles and flat very bad feet ( 50 yrs doing Judo) and he got 9UK they are wide enough and the insole is spongy and comfy...he says they are like slippers and a bit more structured than his favourite (go walk 2) and more dressy...
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are extremely comfortable and are great for general everyday stuff... I don't think they're suitable for me when I go running, cycling or cross training however they are great to wear when jogging, active walking or general everyday activities... my feet feel very relaxed in these shoes and apart from training I wear them almost all the time.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: As comfortable as slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These Equalizers are just like slippers with a really soft and comfortable gel sole (in fact I have just bought a second pair - one for use as slippers and the other for outside use). They are extremely lightweight and easy to slip into. Not sure how long the pair for outside use will last but at the moment they feel like walking on air!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Comfort A+
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit (size 9). These shoes are very comfortable indeed with the memory foam installed. Slip on nice and snug without the hassle of laces to bother with. I bought these primarily for indoor use as an alternative to slippers but they would be great outdoors. I will probably purchase another pair (different style) for outdoor use now I know how comfortable this range of shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Bough these to replace my gowalks after a year of abuse at work. They make excellent shoes for working on the busy wards in hospital as they are very comfortable and roomy. Memory foam insoles make them excellent for those on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bell

customer_reviews.title: Tops for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using sketcher for a few years now and cannot speak highly enough about them they helped me when I had a foot injury ( planter fasciitis ) and helped me to walk, I have several different pairs for different occasions and they are brilliant, I would highly recommend them the memory foam insole makes a massive difference and takes all the impact out of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these shoes were at least one size too small. In the end, I gave them away, instead of dealing with the hassle of returns.
customer_reviews.author: Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and smart enough for casual workwear.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as work shoes for manual therapy. They wear like slip-on trainers, and the little memory foam layer in the bottom does make them very comfortable, but they're also decently presentable. Your'e not going to be wearing them to a wedding, but they look smart enough if you're on your feet all day. The only negative point I have, is that the foam layer has come away from the side of the shoe a bit after about 6 months of use (about 2 days a week). I have, howerver, bought another pair, as they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Geatchy

customer_reviews.title: 5 UK and was relieved and pleased, they fit
customer_reviews.text: Unusual these days to get size choices in UK sizes only. I had become used to buying 44 Euro sizes which generally translates as '10' UK. However I ordered size 9.5 UK and was relieved and pleased, they fit. So far so good, very comfortable but seem to get a bit restrictive toward the end of the day. Perhaps this will go away as they (or I) wear in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were a little snug but my wife persuaded me that they would stretch with wear quire quickly and as always she was quite right. They may be the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. The first time I walked in them on pavement it was like walking on a trampoline and they are perfect for running for the bus. I am a Sketchers convert.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Rankine

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing build quality. Almost 2 years later and they are still comfortable and every day usage at work has been unfair to them but they are still going strong. I’m thinking of replacing them next year with the same model
customer_reviews.author: W0lfy

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought these originally because I suffer from intermittent plantar fasciitis. It has been much improved since I started wearing these. I have just bought a second pair to use as slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Dad he has Alzheimer's and can't do laces anymore so these slip on well. He wanders all the time so the cushioning and comfort of these trainer shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Loopylou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, lightweight shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who requires shoes that he can get on and off easily. This will be his 2nd pair of sketchers! He loves their comfort and simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Silver-roo

customer_reviews.title: Built like a troll
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fairly large chap and my massive hooves fit into these shoes, though it is tighter across the bridge than other pairs of sketchers I’ve owned. Otherwise as comfy as always. 9/10 would squeeze trotters in again
customer_reviews.author: Peter Blair

customer_reviews.title: Sketcher's Amazing Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for someone with a foot injury. They are amazing. The comfort is excellent with good padding and support. recommended for anyone who wants comfort and support. This is second pair of these purchased for a colour variation. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my dad, he absolutely loves them. He's very sensitive when it comes to footwear as he has diabetes but these are extremely comfortable for him. I got size 11 as he needs a little extra toe room and there is that, even when he wears thick socks they fit just nicely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Firth

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable - stylish alternative to a 'regular' trainer
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a shoe I could wear with shorts for holiday. I'm not into Sandals and a lot of shoes look too heavy. Then I found these which are halfway house between a trainer and show but more stylish IMO. I was also pleasantly surprised to find how extraordinarily comfortable they were. And with the added bonus of knowing how good Skechers are as a brand, they will last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Roy F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Hiccup , resolved, great product. So many shoes/trainers have white soles which get so dirty, these dont, well they do but it doesn’t show! Wearer has plantar fasciitis & these, with insole, are excellent. Hiccup was box arrived, sealed but no shoes inside. All resolved quickly & efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: MIDDEN

customer_reviews.title: Bliss for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: Ooh, now then, are they trainers as described or are they 'slippers'? I used them today to walk around Cheltenham, sheer bliss. I will buy another pair for use in the home as slippers. Brilliant. But why are different sizes SO incredibly more expensive?? Plus a very limited choice of colours unless paying huge amounts of difference in price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sigsworth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair and they are so comfortable and feel like slippers. The price is more expensive than I used to pay but they are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Church

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, never worn them before and wore them on a 12 hour shift. No rubbing or aches from being new, appear to be well made. I've always worn sketchers for work for best part of the last 8 years, these are my new found favourites. My husband liked them so much I had to buy him his own pair
customer_reviews.author: L L wallace

customer_reviews.title: I love Sketches shoes and these ones are great
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketches shoes and these ones are great, very comfy although the soles have worn to the point than when it's wet they can be a tad slippery. Perhaps it's just wear and tear but the rest of the shoe is in great shape so it's been good if the sane could be said for the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As I'm on my feet 9hrs of the day I need something comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Bought as I need shoes in a working environment. As I'm on my feet 9hrs of the day I need something comfortable and light. These do the tick when I first put them on it fitted like a glove and now I been wearing them for the past month I can truly say they are most comfortable pair shoes I have in my wardrobe and now need a pair for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: BonkersBoomerang

customer_reviews.title: Walking o  air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the lightest I've ever held, it's like having next to nothing in your hands and so on my feet, feel like I'm walking on air. The memory foam sees to that. Tightish fit but I expect them to loosen up after wearing them a it. Very good shoe which I use to travel to work and back, and after wearing steel toe cap boots all day, these are just the job.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My son has type1 diabetes and these super lightweight and very comfortable shoes are something of a game changer for his mobility. He now has 2 pairs. The delivery was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent indoor shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something like this for a long time. I use them as an indoor slipper and they are awsome. Comfortable, airy, non slip non squeeky...you name it. Gonna buy another pair for sure
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Made from memory foam so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were for my brother and he loved them he says that they’re so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie B

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect as I expected but caught driver opening the parcel asked amazon they said drivers are not allowed to open parcels under any circumstances
customer_reviews.author: OH no it’s Oh no

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I've had five pairs of these, wear them all day every day everyday and they last around about a year, very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: A Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Waste mkney
customer_reviews.text: Shoes do not have thick insole which is declared as memory foam while walking you feel you are on mark and no cushion like feelings of insole
customer_reviews.author: javid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit as have wide size ten feet , these are comfy lightweight and look good too I would defo buy the same again ...
customer_reviews.author: Samsun

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I use them every day. Unfortunately they don't last too long, but they are so comfy ant not too expensive, so worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe - size was a tad large for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 8.5 - 9 UK size - usually depends on the manufacturer as to whether one or the other will fit. Went for a size 9 and it is a bit on the large size for me - should have gone for 8.5. That said they are really comfortable and very light. Will be buying another pair in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Snellinator

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Smart casual shoe that can be used everyday. Grey sole material is more practical that the white - marks and mud less evident. Upper material needs waterproofing to make them suitable for poor weather conditions. Extremely comfortable and ultra lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: J450N

customer_reviews.title: Just as comfortable as ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of the same shoe I have bought as I have tried others and nothing is more comfortable and as hard wearing as this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read glowing reviews of Skechers and my wife has some. Having bought my first pair I understand the reviews. Mine are so comfortable and they look good with jeans or casual trousers. I’ll be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Noggin

customer_reviews.title: Sketches slip ons
customer_reviews.text: They are the correct size but quite a loose fit. That's ok though I dont like them too tight, just hope they do not stretch in time
customer_reviews.author: A. Kearvell

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ticked all the right boxes. Lightweight, look good, and most importantly they fit really well. Previously had to return a pair of supposedly wide fit shoes, as they were so tight. There is an accommodation with the mesh construction that holds the foot securely without imposing a vice-like grip.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are very comfortable I have a wide foot so that,s why I ordered the men,s shoe,s I take size 7 but I think a 6 would have been plenty big enough arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sharon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them so much he is constantly wearing them. He says they are the most comfortable shoes he has even had. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: tsohg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with sensitiveand delicate  feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad after he saw mine. He has delicate feet due yo diabetes, these are light, give airflow and stop pressure points. And with no laces they're simple to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: new shoes of power
customer_reviews.text: bought for mu better half, fit beautiful(he has small feet and some times struggles with sizes) comfy from the moment he put them on, no need to brake them is (always a bonus)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Linda Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: gr8 footwear
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 4th pair of sketchers my husband has ordered and he feels they fit great, are light on your feet and are smart but still casual. Great choice of colours too
customer_reviews.author: maccaal

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, lightweight, comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very lightweight. Memory foam moulds to the foot and keeps socks in place. They look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Klala290

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy..... the Proclaimers wore them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome shoes. I’m a 7.5-8 normally but 7 in these fitted fine. They are so comfy. I’m a pretty active male & do appreciate good sports wear generally. Have recently visited the US & walked more miles than the Proclaimers. No complaints at all, no rubbing or anything of the kind. Highly recommend these 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman with wide feet.i bought this for work as I do a standing up job 6 hours a day. They are so so comfortable! My feet love them! Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good materials used in shoes
customer_reviews.text: shoes fit but some narrow fit in front so feels discomfort .may be with more wear ,it may become satisfactory fit . my previous pair was size 11 and was moderately large but scholl slip on made it good fit comfortable bhut some one swiped them hence this buy .thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes iv worn
customer_reviews.text: I have real trouble finding shoes that fit my wide feet. These are the Most comfortable shoes iv ever tried and at last iv found shoes that fit me and dont hurt my feet. Plus they look really good to. Im buying another 3 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Nice plain and simple but comfotable to wear. It was tricky sizing, I normally wear size 9 but you can go very wrong with sketchers. No idea why sizes of shoes is not universal across the board.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. N

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Typical of Skechers footwear, very comfortable and light. This is my second pair of this model, the last pair lasted nearly three years and only needed replacement due to soles getting worn out. Feels a bit on the narrow side at the moment but I know it will ease as the shoe wears in.
customer_reviews.author: babbsy

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get rid of shoe odor.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoes. Fitting is perfect as well. Only complaint is how they can get very smelly very quickly. I have tried everything but cannot get rid of the shoe odour (maybe it's the material?)
customer_reviews.author: WLTW

customer_reviews.title: It’s like walking on air!
customer_reviews.text: It is very very light and the memory foam inner is great for problems with the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To be recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these shoes about 16 months ago and needed anew pair. The news ones fitted well like the previous pair but are even better with the latest model. To be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My purchase of sketcher shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase they are very comfortable, I am using them around the house at present the only thing that I have with them is that they are a bit tight at present to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Ecky

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable...dont want to take them off.
customer_reviews.text: love these slip ons...so comfortable to wear and the fit was spot on for me, size 10.
customer_reviews.author: john redpath

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are one of the best buys my husband says would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mse Cj Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but think could be even better the foam at tip of shoe has a ridge and your big toe dips at the end other than that very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Langford

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for walking
customer_reviews.text: Have had a 2 pairs before, very comfortable, great support when walking, light to wear but strong hard wearing, use everyday, I use added insoles also.
customer_reviews.author: S james

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable shoes but expensive for what they are. Had them for 6 months & the inside material is falling to bits, unbranded items out there at a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.author: mr russ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove would definitely buy another pair, great for the summer, I find these shoes fantastic for my holidays so easy to wear all day, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Rowe

customer_reviews.title: All Round Winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them. 'Super-comfy, look good and like walking in you slippers' is the general feedback. Price is reasonable, too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable shoe straight from the box. This was the second pair that I have bought as I was so happy with the first. As others have commented, these would not be suitable for wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: David Prince

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ready for the bin only 2.5 months after purchasing. Really disappointed with them. Only positive is that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: So comfy - you won't regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for work - on my feet for 13 hour shifts and they're so comfy. All other shoes have left my legs hurting by the end of the day, but these work a treat. Perfect for us busy nurses' or anyone else on their feet majority of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastice buy so comfortable, the best shoe ever purchased by me, as comfortable as slippers. Thank You, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light comfy breathable
customer_reviews.text: I returned first pair of these as they were massive for a 12 which I always wear in sketchers and I’ve had at least 20 pairs. Can’t understand why but I got an 11 and they fit great. So comfy and light for work. Gonna order another pair soon
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these, got 1st pair in 2016 and lasted well and still wearable just got a newer and neater pair for work. HIGHLY recommended as extremely light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant be beaten
customer_reviews.text: Best pair I have ever bought use daily for last eighteen months most comfortable shoes ever , on my feet all day love them worth every penny .
customer_reviews.author: mr a d williamson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My dad will wear nothing but sketchers now! This is the second thirs pair Ive bought him. Amazon always have the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: CLYDSKE

customer_reviews.title: Skechers firness shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not sure that are going to make me any fitter but will say they are very comfortable, so please that I waited to find a pair of walking shoes that will be good on holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value shoe. They're as comfortable as a slipper and strong as a shoe. I have given up my slippers since buying Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for Walking!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of Skechers and already shaping up to give the care to my 76 year old feet, that the previous two pairs have given. The dog is happy with them as well. He goes walkies every day because my Skechers make it so enjoyable. Great value for money as well.
customer_reviews.author: Greyspark

customer_reviews.title: Best casual slip on I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were too light to begin with. Now very easy to put on ,very comfortable and soon will need another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Sketcher comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of sketchers and definitely as comfortable as ever from these manufacturers. Very reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ1307

customer_reviews.title: Fab !
customer_reviews.text: My dad was thrilled with these, and hasn't had them off since he got them ! A bargain too compared to the cost of them on the high street.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: How to return the item with a printed post office label
customer_reviews.text: Item too big and unable to return them as i can not use the return method offered because I am partially sighted. I could print a post office return label, as on previous occasions but this method is not now offered. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Can be worn straight out of the box very comfortable and a good size more comfortable than my slippers , not sure about durability for a lot of walking that I do, glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: A.W

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers Equalizer Sneakers ...oh so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I do like to loaf about at home in a pair of shoes that go on and off quickly. These are nigh on perfect. Inexpensive, they weigh next to nothing, and are so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: ... would for these type of trainers they are of excellent quality, and really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: although i paid a little more that i normally would for these type of trainers they are of excellent quality, and really comfortable, Sketchers always cost more than most trainers but this company offered the cheapest price I could find either on the high street or on line
customer_reviews.author: wigglesfield

customer_reviews.title: Slip on easy and very comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: Slip on easy and very comfortable to walk in, nice and light so they are as advertised and I am well pleased with them so far, now just remains to see if they last.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Stow

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful value for money
customer_reviews.text: These were rubbish I wote through them in a week and 2 days no.insole left now through the sole already. Crap
customer_reviews.author: Graham Ring

customer_reviews.title: Ideal comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is second pair I've bought but in a different colour. So comfy. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased to save wearing the same pair every day. Much better than slippers as you can wear them outdoors.They are very light and comfortable also keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Desbroom

customer_reviews.title: They come up big, excessive postage fee
customer_reviews.text: They fit a lot bigger than your usual size. Be careful when ordering as you have to pay the return postage which is a lot and they do not give the full refund. Won’t be ordering from these again.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Wary of buying shoes online as fit seems to vary so much between makes and styles. Already have a pair of sketchers so I hoped the size would be okay. No worries as fit was superb and they are wonderfully comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light. Easy to put on and take off if you have trouble getting down to lace up shoes
customer_reviews.author: Happy Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort
customer_reviews.text: This are my husband's 3rd pair. He walks miles in them and they go in the washing machine. He loves them.... like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Equalizer Double Play Wide-51509 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Sporty style and amazing comfort gives you twice the reasons to enjoy the Skechers equalizer - Double play shoe. Skech knit mesh nearly one piece fabric upper in a slip on sporty comfort moc with stitching and overlay accents. Gel infused memory foam insole.
